headline: Role of Boards in Shareholder Activism – LA CorpGov Forum
summary: CorpGov is pleased to provide complete video coverage of the inaugural LA CorpGov Forum held on Sept. 4, 2025, at the Edelman Headquarters in the heart of Hollywood. headline: PNC to buy Colorado bank for $4.1 billion as part of coast-to-coast push
summary: Pittsburgh’s PNC Financial Services Group said Monday it reached an agreement to acquire Colorado lender FirstBank for $4.1 billion, moving one of the largest regional banks in the US one step closer to becoming a coast-to-coast brand.

raw.headline: PNC to buy Colorado bank for $4.1 billion as part of coast-to-coast push

headline: JPMorgan’s Bassi says the bar for a 50bp Fed cut remains high
summary: Investing.com -- JPMorgan strategist Fabio Bassi said the Federal Reserve’s expected policy shift at its September meeting is likely to be limited to a quarter-point reduction, stressing that “the bar for a 50bp cut remains high.”

headline: Klarna IPO Update: Don't Buy Now Or Later
summary: Klarna's IPO is unattractive; its $13-14B valuation is far too expensive. Despite revenue growth, Klarna remains unprofitable and faces intense competition.
